publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1540 Mr Gil Paterson: The Big Blockade—That the Parliament supports Trident Ploughshares in their "Big Blockade" protests against Trident at Faslane on Monday 12 February 2001; recognises that Trident is an indiscriminate weapon of mass destruction, poised to kill millions of civilians, polluting the Scottish environment with radiation and outlawed by international humanitarian law, and urges all MSPs to support this campaign.
S1M-1540 The Big Blockade (lodged on 15 January 2001) Michael Matheson*, Christine Grahame*, Shona Robison*
S1M-1540 The Big Blockade (lodged on 15 January 2001) Colin Campbell*, Kay Ullrich*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-1540 Mr Gil Paterson: The Big Blockade—That the Parliament supports Trident Ploughshares in their "Big Blockade" protests against Trident at Faslane on Monday 12 February 2001; recognises that Trident is an indiscriminate weapon of mass destruction, poised to kill millions of civilians, polluting the Scottish environment with radiation and outlawed by international humanitarian law, and urges all MSPs to support this campaign. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison, Colin Campbell, Kay Ullrich, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-1540 The Big Blockade (lodged on 15 January 2001) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-1540 The Big Blockade (lodged on 15 January 2001) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-1540 The Big Blockade (lodged on 15 January 2001) Richard Lochhead*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S1M-1540 The Big Blockade (lodged on 15 January 2001) Michael Russell*

S1M-1540 Mr Gil Paterson: The Big Blockade—That the Parliament supports Trident Ploughshares in their "Big Blockade" protests against Trident at Faslane on Monday 12 February 2001; recognises that Trident is an indiscriminate weapon of mass destruction, poised to kill millions of civilians, polluting the Scottish environment with radiation and outlawed by international humanitarian law, and urges all MSPs to support this campaign. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison, Colin Campbell, Kay Ullrich, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Fiona McLeod, Linda Fabiani, Richard Lochhead, Roseanna Cunningham, Michael Russell
S1M-1540 The Big Blockade (lodged on 15 January 2001) Fergus Ewing*, Ms Margo MacDonald*
S1M-1540 The Big Blockade (lodged on 15 January 2001) Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-1540 The Big Blockade (lodged on 15 January 2001) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-1540 The Big Blockade (lodged on 15 January 2001) Brian Adam*

S1M-1540 Mr Gil Paterson: The Big Blockade—That the Parliament supports Trident Ploughshares in their "Big Blockade" protests against Trident at Faslane on Monday 12 February 2001; recognises that Trident is an indiscriminate weapon of mass destruction, poised to kill millions of civilians, polluting the Scottish environment with radiation and outlawed by international humanitarian law, and urges all MSPs to support this campaign. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison, Colin Campbell, Kay Ullrich, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Fiona McLeod, Linda Fabiani, Richard Lochhead, Roseanna Cunningham, Michael Russell, Fergus Ewing, Ms Margo MacDonald, Dr Winnie Ewing, Ms Sandra White, Brian Adam
S1M-1540 The Big Blockade (lodged on 15 January 2001) Robin Harper*

S1M-1540 Mr Gil Paterson: The Big Blockade—That the Parliament supports Trident Ploughshares in their "Big Blockade" protests against Trident at Faslane on Monday 12 February 2001; recognises that Trident is an indiscriminate weapon of mass destruction, poised to kill millions of civilians, polluting the Scottish environment with radiation and outlawed by international humanitarian law, and urges all MSPs to support this campaign. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison, Colin Campbell, Kay Ullrich, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Fiona McLeod, Linda Fabiani, Richard Lochhead, Roseanna Cunningham, Michael Russell, Fergus Ewing, Ms Margo MacDonald, Dr Winnie Ewing, Ms Sandra White, Brian Adam, Robin Harper
